short.zh_CN: 通往 Web3 世界的大门

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Halo(halo.social) is designed to build a revolutionary monetization layer within the SocialFi field, aiming to create a new paradigm of UBI that grants ownership to everyone. Halo extension offers you a secure and easy way to access your digital assets and interact with dApps in your browser.

With Halo extension, you can:
- Manage your crypto assets conveniently
- View your NFT collection
- Interact with a variety of dApps seamlessly
- Establish your Web3 identity

Add Halo extension to your browser to connect with thousands of dApps on Ethereum, Avalanche, Polygon, BNB Chain, and beyond. Effortlessly explore the Web3 world and step into a new era of social networking with Halo!
long.zh_CN:
Halo Extension让您在浏览器中安全、便捷的访问您的数字资产，并使用各种去中心化应用程序。

使用Halo Extension，您可以：
— 一站式管理您的数字资产
— 查看您的NFT藏品
— 探索去中心化网络
— 与各种DApp无缝交互

Halo Extension旨在让每个加密货币爱好者无缝连接到Web3网络。添加Halo Extension到您的浏览器，轻松探索Web3世界!
